activities.name: enrichEmployeeProfile
activities.description: Performs the enrichment process on the data from the given input path, then clears the output of previous runs and then writes the result of the current run.

activities.name: enrichEmployeeProfile
activities.description: Performs the enrichment process on the data from the given input path, then clears the output of previous runs and then writes the result of the current run.

properties.description: Extracts latest reply from each emails thread and performs deduplication of emails so that only one instance is preserved per internetMessageId

activities.name: Set batchDateTime
activities.description: Extract the UTC date and time corresponding to the current batch of emails being processed

activities.name: Set batchMonth
activities.description: Extract the month corresponding to the current batch of emails being processed

activities.name: Set batchYear
activities.description: Extract the year corresponding to the current batch of emails being processed

activities.name: Set batchTimeBasedSubpath
activities.description: Build the structure of a folder hierarchy  that is specific to the time window of the current batch. This path component will be reused relative to various parent folders, to allow passing the data specific to a time window between pipeline stages.

activities.name: Success
activities.description: The delete stages fail if the blob files they are trying to delete don't exist, but we don't want the whole pipeline to fail if there are no files to be deleted. This Wait Activity is used only to make the  whole pipeline succeed even if one of the delete stages fails.
